characterList: 乙子孔吼了女好如母貫兄克

characters.story: The hook stands for second, whispering "Yee" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show child, whispering "Zi" softly - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents cavity, whispering "Kong" softly - a vivid image to remember!
See how the mouth forms to roar? It whispers "Ho!" softly spoken through parted lips!
Completed action of child says "luh" neutrally when done!
A striking symbol for woman that whispers "Nyu" softly - a vivid image to remember!
A woman and child bend down drooping together, good and saying "Hao"!
A woman's mouth asks "Ru? Are we alike?" questioning similarity!
A striking symbol for mother that whispers "Mu" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Pierce through the shell sharply commanding "Guan!" with mother above!
The strokes unite to show elder brother, singing "Shyong!" cheerfully!
Picture to overcome taking form - it shouts "Kuh!" with vivid energy!
